meaningMnemonic: You have at your disposal a <radical>tsunami</radical> and a <radical>hook</radical> to assassinate this <radical>person</radical>. Which weapon will you choose. <kanji>Decide</kanji> now!
readingMnemonic:
To remember the reading けつ we always use the word "ketsup." It's a special mix of ketchup and catsup (yum!)

You finally <kanji>decide</kanji>. You're going to go with the tsunami... but not just any tsunami. You'll kill him with a tsunami of <reading>ketsu</reading>p (けつ).
